de.cellular.lib.lightlib.ui.view.gallery
Class LLSlideView

java.lang.Object
  View
      de.cellular.lib.lightlib.ui.view.gallery.LLSlideView

 class LLSlideView
extends View

A sliding view draws bitmaps with finger or without finger under control of timer.

Client developer can't use the view directly.

Weakness of current versions

  • LLSlideView can only show the items whose height is larger than width.
  • Data source should have equal width and height.

    • Version:
    1.0.2
  • Downloaded images are available in listeners

    • 1.0.1

  • Add

    • appendImage(Bitmap, int)

    getCurrentPosition()

    Fixed bug that the single loaded item will disappear.

    , 1.0

  • just a beginning
    • Author:
    Chris Xinyue Zhao
